author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Has Adam Savage ever made an exoskeleton? Does the series Murderbot make Adam see  Buster in a new light? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members remym1362 and elanorgrimes5655, whom we thank for their support! Which Muppet reminds you most of Buster?

00:00 Exoskeletons and Putney, VT
04:12 Murderbot Diaries and Buster
09:42 Tested membership
